content.rendered:
Single 4×4 Flush Mount

DETAILS

Single 4×4 Flush Mount

Dimensions:

  • Gauge Diameter 37mm
  • Overall Dimensions 61mm x 43.5mm

SPECIFICATIONS

Single 4×4 Flush Mount for dash

*This product only includes the Single Flush Mount plate, accessories sold separately*

 

WHAT’S IN THE BOX

1 x Single Flush Mounting Plate (Volt meter not included)
